name: Ascend (itch) (Supereiris)
description:
Welcome to my prototype game - Ascend. This game is all about platforms and more specifically getting to the top. I am currently testing out the mechanics, artstyle and vibe of the game so I would be very happy if you took time to try it.

I made this game with the intend of it being a so called rage game, where a small mistake could cause you hours of progress (minutes in this case).  I am still thinking about it and I would really like to hear your opinion too.

After you play the game I would appreciate it if you complete this survey:

https://forms.gle/3hTwMHNoFVNEoLPL8

Features to add in the future:

  • More "levels" (Definitely)
  • A bit of lore
  • A darker vibe
  • More animations, soundFX, etc

Be sure to follow me to get notified on the updates of the game!
